mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, T .* FROM "AMPC"."T_ES_NATIVE" T WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND ES_NATIVE_TP_ID = #{nativeTpId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND IS_VERIFY = 1 order by ES_NATIVE_ID DESC ) WHERE rn >= #{startTotal,jdbcType=OTHER} AND rn <= #{endTotal,jdbcType=OTHER}
SELECT "COUNT" (ROWNUM) FROM "AMPC"."T_ES_NATIVE" T WHERE USER_ID=#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND ES_NATIVE_TP_ID = #{esNativeTpId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND IS_VERIFY = 1
